bike.description: Alpha Platinum Aluminum, ABP Convert, E2 tapered head tube, internal derailleur & dropper post routing, press fit BB, Flow Mold carbon swing link, post mount brake, G2 Geometry, 100mm travel

components.description: RockShox SID RL w/Solo Air spring, rebound, PushLoc remote lockout, E2 tapered steerer, 15mm Maxle Lite, custom G2 Geometry w/51mm offset, 100mm travel
DT Swiss X1800, 15mm front hub; 142x12 rear w/tubeless rims, strips, and valves
Bontrager XR1 Team Issue Tubeless Ready, aramid bead, 29x2.20"
Shimano Deore XT, low direct mount
Bontrager Race Lite Low Riser, 31.8mm, 5mm rise
FSA IS-2, E2, sealed cartridge bearing
